content.description:
This is the sit variation of working man, it adds an additional 3 moves. Start on two crimps a few feet right of the dish and throw a heel hook, cross right hand over to another crimp. Reach left hand out for the dish and lock in your core to match. Finish the rest of the boulder as you would for working man.

 You could start even further to the right if you want, but starting here prevents the annoying butt dab.
content.location: The gem boulder, start to the right of Working Man

content.description: Start with your hands on the dish in the lower middle of the boulder and climb left working your way to the point at the end of the boulder. a fun sustained problem with great moves. the crux is where ever your anaerobic respiration kicks in.
content.location: start in middle lower part of the boulder and finish on the left point of the boulder.

content.description: A Small boulder on the central eastern side of Hay Creek Boulders.
